events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle and provided initial details about the collision that occurred on the highway.
The insurance claim was categorised under auto accident after reviewing keywords such as car, collision, and accident in the report.
An agent specialized in auto accident claims has been assigned to assist the customer through the claim process promptly.
The claim has been officially acknowledged and the customer was informed about the next steps and required documents.
The customer was requested to submit the accident report, photos of the vehicle damage, and a police report to proceed with the investigation.
All required documents including the accident report and vehicle photos were submitted by the customer for review.
The claim investigation has started with the assigned agent contacting the police department to verify the accident details.
The investigation was completed after verifying all documents and inspecting the vehicle damage; the report is now ready.
A settlement amount was proposed based on the investigation findings covering repair costs and related expenses for the auto accident.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement offer and expressed appreciation for the timely communication.
The claim was approved following customer acceptance of the settlement, allowing the process to move forward with payment issuance.
The agreed settlement payment was issued to the customerâ€™s account to cover the auto repair and associated costs.
The auto accident claim has been formally closed after successful payment and customer confirmation that the issue was resolved.
